Name: Google Keyword Planner
description_c: Free keyword research tool from Google that helps you discover new keywords and get search volume data for your PPC campaigns.

Name: Google Ads Editor
description_c: Desktop application for managing Google Ads campaigns offline with bulk editing capabilities and advanced campaign management features.

Name: Optmyzr
description_c: PPC management platform that automates campaign optimization with AI-powered bidding strategies and performance monitoring.

Name: Unbounce
description_c: Landing page builder with drag-and-drop interface, A/B testing capabilities, and conversion optimization tools for PPC campaigns.

Name: Google Analytics
description_c: Web analytics platform that provides detailed insights into website traffic, user behavior, and conversion tracking for PPC campaigns.

Name: Canva
description_c: Graphic design platform for creating professional ad creatives, banners, and marketing materials for PPC campaigns.

Name: SEMrush
description_c: All-in-one marketing toolkit for SEO, PPC, and competitor analysis with comprehensive keyword research and ad intelligence features.

Name: Microsoft Advertising Editor
description_c: Desktop application for managing Microsoft Advertising campaigns with bulk editing and offline campaign management capabilities.

Name: WordStream Advisor
description_c: PPC optimization platform that provides automated recommendations, performance monitoring, and campaign improvement suggestions.

Name: Leadpages
description_c: Landing page builder focused on lead generation with high-converting templates and integrated analytics for PPC traffic.

Name: Hotjar
description_c: User behavior analytics tool that provides heatmaps, session recordings, and user feedback to optimize PPC landing pages.

Name: Adobe Creative Suite
description_c: Professional design software suite including Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign for creating high-quality ad creatives and marketing materials.

Name: Ahrefs
description_c: SEO and PPC research tool with comprehensive keyword data, competitor analysis, and content gap analysis for campaign planning.

Name: Adalysis
description_c: PPC optimization platform that automates ad testing, provides optimization recommendations, and monitors campaign performance across multiple channels.

Name: Figma
description_c: Collaborative design platform for creating user interfaces, prototypes, and marketing materials with real-time collaboration features.
